name: Solar System (itch) (JoemarM)
description:
Hello! This is my Solar System project. I adde the Following Elements

  1. Sun
  2. Mercury
  3. Venus
  4. Earth with 1 Moon
  5. Mars with 2 Moons

I also made visual changes for the existing assets:

  1. Space Texture
  2. Added Point Lights to all of the Planets, Sun, and Comet
